verses.name: Jeremiah 51:19
verses.text: The portion of Jacob is not like them; for he is the former of all things: and Israel is the rod of his inheritance: the Lord of hosts is his name.

verses.name: Jeremiah 51:20
verses.text: Thou art my battle axe and weapons of war: for with thee will I break in pieces the nations, and with thee will I destroy kingdoms;

verses.name: Jeremiah 51:21
verses.text: And with thee will I break in pieces the horse and his rider; and with thee will I break in pieces the chariot and his rider;
